description: This file is a Python script that sets up an AI agent with specific tools and models, runs a stock price query, and prints various metrics and responses related to the agent's operation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured with a language model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response stream from the agent's run method.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and options, returning a stream of responses.

methods.name: pprint
methods.description: Pretty-prints various objects, used here for metrics and session data.
